[[Kakashi]] forms two [[Lightning Cutter]]s instead of just one. He runs towards the opponent and plunges one into the target, followed by the other. 

[[es:Cortador de Relámpago: Luces Gemelas Perforadoras]]
[[pt-br:Raikiri: Perfuração das Luzes Gêmeas]]
